title: Looking for a fun "try anything" kind of community
body: hey, i just transferred from NA to OCE, i live in OCE, but played NA because i hate toxicity, im looking for a good group, preferrably with a teamspeak, to play normals and have fun :) i used to hang around teamspeak or raidcall communities, but am finding it really hard to find a group of people, in OCE.

replies.body: On OCE there are very few "nice" players, all the nice players left because of the "toxic" ones.
Shifted here recently myself as well, left a bunch of good friends for good ping and am lookin' to make some new friends who just enjoy the game, ign is Tirolei so feel free to add me.
Hi, you can add me, I am returning to the game after a couple of months, Super casual atm, so if you want to do norms and "try anything" let me know xD
I can't find much either. If you do, let me know!
hey, whats your ingame name? ill add you for a few normals
